author: Foliovision

foliovision.display_name: Foliovision: Making the web work for you

sections.description:
FV Testimonials brings you easy management of your testimonials.

  • Easy to use and configured straight out of the box
  • Easy embedding of testimonials everywhere on site
  • Requires almost no installation (just copy and activate)
  • Doesn’t create database overage (just a single additional query on a page with testimonials)

Download now!

sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin
    1. Unpack the contents (directory named fv-testimonials)
    2. Upload the directory with your favourite FTP client to your WordPress plugins directory (usually found “root of domain”/wp-content/plugins)
    3. Go to WordPress plugins management and activate the plugin
sections.faq:
How do I insert the testimonials into the page?

Just use the shortcode [testimonials show=”all”] to display all published testimonials.

For more detailed options for shortcode refer to our manual at https://foliovision.com/wordpress/plugins/fv-testimonials/user-guide
